response.original_title: おおかみこどもの雨と雪
response.overview: After her werewolf lover unexpectedly dies in an accident, a woman must find a way to raise the son and daughter that she had with him. However, their inheritance of their father's traits prove to be a challenge for her.
response.title: Wolf Children
